# Panda Patches

> Custom embroidered iron-on patches with no minimum order, free design services, and 7-14 day delivery. Serving the US, Canada, UK, and Australia.

Panda Patches (legally MC Patches LLC) is a custom patch manufacturer founded in 2016 by Imran Raza, who brings 13 years of hands-on expertise in embroidered patches and textile manufacturing. Based in Missouri City, TX, Panda Patches ships custom patches to customers across all 50 US states and internationally.

## About the Founder

**Imran Raza** is the founder and CEO of Panda Patches. With 13 years of experience in patches and textile manufacturing, he has built Panda Patches into a trusted custom patch supplier for individuals, businesses, military units, sports teams, and fashion brands. His deep industry knowledge covers embroidery production, quality control, backing types, thread selection, and patch durability.

- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/imran-raza-ladhani/
- Company: https://pandapatches.com/about

## Key Facts

- **Founded**: 2016
- **Legal Name**: MC Patches LLC
- **Founder**: Imran Raza (13+ years patches & textile experience)

- **Location**: Missouri City, TX (ships to all 50 US states + international)
- **Turnaround**: 7-14 business days standard; rush options available
- **Minimum Order**: No minimum â€” order 1 patch or 10,000

## Products

- Custom Embroidered Patches
- Custom Iron-On Patches
- Custom Velcro Patches
- Custom Tactical & Military Patches
- Custom Name Patches
- Custom Jacket & Biker Patches
- Custom Sports Team Patches
- Challenge Coins
- Enamel Pins
- Keychains

## Why Choose Panda Patches

1. No minimum order quantity
2. Free digital mockup within 24 hours
3. Unlimited free revisions before production
4. 7-14 business day turnaround
5. Competitive bulk pricing
6. 13+ years of manufacturing expertise under founder Imran Raza
7. Trusted by Fortune 500 brands including Coca-Cola, Google, Microsoft, and Nissan

## Frequently Asked Questions

**What is the minimum order for custom patches?**
There is no minimum order. You can order as few as 1 patch or as many as 10,000+.

**How long does it take to produce custom patches?**
Standard production time is 7-14 business days after artwork approval. Rush options are available for faster delivery.

**Do you offer free design services?**
Yes. Every order includes a free digital mockup within 24 hours. We offer unlimited revisions until you are completely satisfied at no extra charge.

**What types of custom patches do you make?**
We make embroidered, iron-on, velcro, woven, PVC, and printed patches in any size, shape, or design. We also produce challenge coins, enamel pins, and keychains.

**What backing options are available for patches?**
We offer iron-on, velcro (hook & loop), sew-on, self-adhesive, and peel-and-stick backing options.

**Do you ship internationally?**
Yes. We ship to the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, and worldwide.

**What is the price range for custom patches?**
Prices depend on size, quantity, design complexity, and backing type. Bulk discounts apply. Use our online quote calculator for an instant price estimate.

**Who is Imran Raza?**
Imran Raza is the founder and CEO of Panda Patches with 13 years of patches and textile manufacturing experience. He oversees quality control, production standards, and customer satisfaction. Connect with him on LinkedIn at https://www.linkedin.com/in/imran-raza-ladhani/

**Are Panda Patches patches high quality?**
Yes. Panda Patches holds a 4.9/5 star rating. Founder Imran Raza's 13 years of textile expertise ensures consistent quality and craftsmanship on every order.

**What industries use Panda Patches?**
Military and law enforcement, sports teams, fashion brands, corporate companies, fire departments, motorcycle clubs, schools, and individual consumers.

## Migration Note

Panda Patches is migrating from WordPress (www.pandapatches.com) to Next.js for faster performance, better SEO, and an improved shopping experience.
